title: Which motion has an acceleration of zero?

content.prompt:
For which of the following motions of an object must the acceleration always be zero?

I. Any motion in a straight line

II. Simple harmonic motion

III. Any motion in a circle

choices.label: Either I or III, but not II
None of these motions guarantees zero acceleration.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
